#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term;
  bool_t agreement = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  auto event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  if (agreement)
  {
    event->Wait(600000);
    if(operationdB.find(to_string(oid)+"put") != operationdB.end() && 
       operationdB[to_string(oid)+"put"] == true)
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    else{
      Log_info("Put No leader : %d", sp_log_svr_->loc_id_);
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
  }
  else if(!agreement)


    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  else
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term;
  bool_t agreement = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  auto event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  if(agreement){
    string s = to_string(oid) + "append";
    Log_info("Operation Id = %s", s.c_str());
    event->Wait(600000);
    if(operationdB.find(to_string(oid)+"append") != operationdB.end() && 
       operationdB[to_string(oid)+"append"] == true)
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    else{
      Log_info("Append No leader : %d", sp_log_svr_->loc_id_);
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
  }
  else if(!agreement)
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  else
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  Log_info("Get Command for %d", sp_log_svr_->site_id_);
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  //s->data_.push_back(v);
  auto cmd = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term;
  bool_t agreement = GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &index, &term);
  auto event = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  //Log_info("Agreement %d", agreement);
  //Log_info("Ops Id in GET= %s", k.c_str()11);
  event->Wait(600000);

  if (agreement)
  {
    if(operationdB.find(to_string(oid)+"get") != operationdB.end() && 
       operationdB[to_string(oid)+"get"] == true){
        *v = dB[k];
        return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    else{
      Log_info("Get No leader : %d", sp_log_svr_->loc_id_);
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }  
  }
  else if(!agreement){
    if(operationdB.find(to_string(oid)+"get") != operationdB.end() && 


       operationdB[to_string(oid)+"get"] == true){
        *v = dB[k];
        return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    else
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  else
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  string opId = v->data_[0];
  string ops = v->data_[1];
  string key = v->data_[2];
  if(ops == "put"){
    Log_info("SVR : %d, Ops Id in on Next PUT= %s", sp_log_svr_->site_id_,key.c_str());
    string value = v->data_[3];
    dB[key] = value;
    operationdB[opId + ops] = true;
  }
  else if(ops == "append"){
    Log_info("SVR : %d, Ops Id in on Next APPEND= %s", sp_log_svr_->site_id_,key.c_str());
    string value = v->data_[3];
    dB[key] += value;
    operationdB[opId + ops] = true;
  }
  else if(ops == "get"){
    Log_info("SVR : %d, Ops Id in on Next GET= %s", sp_log_svr_->site_id_,key.c_str());
    operationdB[opId + ops] = true;
  }

  // for(auto i:operationdB){
  //   Log_info("Ops DB: %s", i.first.c_str());
  // }

  for(auto i: dB){
    Log_info("key = %s, value = %s", i.first.c_str(), i.second.c_str());
  }


  Log_info("-------------------------------");
  /* your code here */
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
